name: cargo11b
description:
Game description:

Take part in dark adventure, which takes place in year 2030 on space station, in space underworld well known from "cargo" broking services.
 
Play as mercenary Nick Rycle and investigate why station is sending SOS signal. Determine what happened to the crew, and backup data from emergency systems.

And watch your back.

Features:

* AA+ game standard(various systems, like inventory, notifications, interaction system, cutscenes, fps shooting, bossfight)
* slender-like key items gathering
* moody sounds
* environmental storytelling
* short, but action-packed (30+ mins)

Recommendations:

* use headphones
* focus on playing

Note: this is alpha version, created as my final bachelor project.
